  • Field Details

    • DIGEST

      public static final io.crums.util.hash.Digest DIGEST
      Digest used by the libary is staticly defined here. Currently SHA-256.

    • HASH_WIDTH

      public static final int HASH_WIDTH
      Digest hash width in bytes (32). Derived from DIGEST.hashWidth().
